sourcesContent:
import "./ahc.css" export default function Ahc13() { return (

How to stop procrastinating by using the two minute rule

  • When you dream about making a change, excitement inevitably takes over and you end up trying to do too much too soon
  • When you start a new habit it should take less than 2 min to do
  • The point is to master the habit of showing up
  • The more you ritualise the begining of a process, the more likely it becomes that you can slip into the state of deep focus that is required to do great things
  • Make it easy to start and the rest will follow, make the first action mindless
  • One small push is better than not doing it at all
) }
